short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically close all your brackets and quotes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you type "(", chances are you are going to type ")" as well. Nobody would leave a bracket or quote open, so this offline program autofills the second part! If you're familiar with IDEs, that's exactly what this is except autocompletion is browser-wide.
